#summary hasOne(name[class,foreignKey])
#labels api,1.0

*Category*:

[ModelInitializationFunctions Model Initialization Functions]

*Description*:

Sets up a `has one` association between this class and the specified one.

*Return Type*:

Void

*History*:

-

*Parameters*:

|| *Name* || *Type* || *Required* || *Default* || *Description* ||
|| *name* || string || true || - || Name of the association ||
|| *class* || string || false ||   || Name of associated class ||
|| * foreignKey* || string || false ||   || AForeign key property name ||

*Examples*:

{{{
<cfset hasOne("author")>
}}}

*Related*:

 * [Associations Associations] (chapter)

 * [belongsTo belongsTo()] (function)
